content: this gorgeous lydie beanie has a great texture and works up quickly it is the perfect compliment to the lydie infinity scarf this pattern is one of the november contributions to the 2024 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 40-110 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn in 3 colors i used furls wander acrylic* yarn * size j 6 mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
